name: Ceramed II - Cerâmicos para Aplicações Médicas SA
headAddress: Rua João Francisco do Casal, Armazém 4, Zona Industrial de Taboeira
goal: Bioceramed is a European healthcare company, specialized in the design, manufacture and sale of calcium phosphate devices for orthopaedic, spine and dental applications. The main goal of the company is to contribute for the technological innovations of this medical sector, thus contributing for the competitiveness of the European medical device market
euInitiatives:
Medical Device Directive (93/42/EEC) as amended by the Directive 2007/47/CE.

Regulation (EU) 2017/745
